sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>rm_story</collection> <condition>(current.project_phase.changes()) || (current.sprint.changes() && !JSUtil.nil(current.project_phase))</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Derive phase dates from sprints on story</name> <order>5000</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var agilePhase = current.project_phase; if(current.project_phase.changes() && JSUtil.nil(current.project_phase)) agilePhase = previous.project_phase; var deriveDatesForAgilePhase = agilePhase.agile_rollup_dates; if(deriveDatesForAgilePhase){ var projectApi = new ProjectWorkbenchScrumApis(); projectApi.deriveAgilePhaseDatesFromStories(agilePhase); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-03-01 13:47:53</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>046f8fe80b513200a6acc93563673a3d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Derive phase dates from sprints on story</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">3331d11d93f08210b31a30dcebba1023</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_046f8fe80b513200a6acc93563673a3d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-03-07 07:26:50</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=046f8fe80b513200a6acc93563673a3d"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Derive phase dates from sprints on story
